00037 #include "egs_line_shape.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 #include "egs_functions.h"
00040 
00041 EGS_LineShape::EGS_LineShape(const vector<EGS_Float> &points,
00042     const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) : EGS_BaseShape(Name,f) {
00043     int np = points.size(); n = np/2;
00044     if( n <= 1 ) { n = 0; return; }
00045     x = new EGS_Float[n]; y = new EGS_Float[n];
00046     EGS_Float *w = new EGS_Float [n-1];
00047     for(int j=0; j<n; j++) {
00048         x[j] = points[2*j]; y[j] = points[2*j+1];
00049         if( j > 0 ) {
00050             EGS_Float ax = x[j]-x[j-1], ay = y[j]-y[j-1];
00051             w[j-1] = sqrt(ax*ax+ay*ay);
00052         }
00053     }
00054     table = new EGS_AliasTable(n-1,x,w,0); otype = "line";
00055 }
00056 
00057 extern "C" {
00058 
00059 EGS_LINE_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_BaseShape* createShape(EGS_Input *input,
00060         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00061     if( !input ) {
00062         egsWarning("createShape(line): null input?\n"); return 0;
00063     }
00064     vector<EGS_Float> points;
00065     int err = input->getInput("points",points);
00066     if( err ) {
00067         egsWarning("createShape(line): no 'points' input\n"); return 0;
00068     }
00069     int np = points.size();
00070     if( (np%2) != 0 ) {
00071         egsWarning("createShape(line): you must input an even number of"
00072              " floating numbers\n"); return 0;
00073     }
00074     if( np < 4 ) {
00075         egsWarning("createShape(line): you must input at least 2 2D points"
00076              " to form a line\n");
00077         return 0;
00078     }
00079     EGS_LineShape *shape = new EGS_LineShape(points,"",f);
00080     shape->setName(input); shape->setTransformation(input);
00081     return shape;
00082 }
00083 
00084 }
